plot: A series looking at various forms of "ideal beauty" and the lengths people will go to to achieve attractiveness, youthfulness and the perfect figure.
title: The Truth About Beauty
plot_es: A series looking at various forms of "ideal beauty" and the lengths people will go to to achieve attractiveness, youthfulness and the perfect figure.
plot_en: A series looking at various forms of "ideal beauty" and the lengths people will go to to achieve attractiveness, youthfulness and the perfect figure.
